content: a simple scandinavian nisselue from me to all of you wishing you happy holidays knit in the round using rib and stockinette only this is my gift to all of you as thanks for your tremendous support as i am dipping my toes into knitwear designs i hope you will enjoy this pattern and if you need any help or have any suggestions please do not hesitate to contact me on ravelry the group skeindeer knits is the best place for support happy knitting **sizes** - small 54cm - medium 57cm - large 61cm **gauge** - small 28 sts per 10cm/4 - medium 26 sts per 10m/4 - large 24 sts per 10cm/4 **tools** - 1x stitch marker - gauge size and 1/4 below gauge size circular 40 cm/16 needles - gauge size circular 80 cm/32 needles *or* dpns
